overview: A group of guys finds out what it's like to be in a porn flick! First, birthday boy Doug Jeffries gives Dean Maxwell a picture-perfect present that both can enjoy on his birthday - sex! Next, Peter Wilder and J.T. Sloan give their bodies to each other for a session of sex each has always pictured. Then, Josh Evers becomes really, really, really close with John Royce, and finally, Jason Nikas hold a casting call and Dino Phillips shows up.
title: Wanna Be in Pictures?
